title: Nicholson Yacht's Kelly Shea on Yacht Charter Vacations (Audio)

description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Karen Kelly Shea, President and CEO of Nicholson Yachts, on the business of chartering yachts.
